page.title: Tritanium Wrench
page.text: The $itemName can be used to dismantle most Matter Overdrive machines as well as machines from other mods. It can also be used to rotate all types of blocks.
To dismantle a machine instantly just right click the machine while sneaking and holding the wrench. Most machines will keep their configurations and items when placed after being dismantled.
To rotate a block simply right click it while holding the wrench.
